_source.text: #6 The Expanded Age Limit Factor Much has been made of the differences between The X Factor and its singing show rivals like American Idol and The Voice , but the most noticeable and immediately rewarding difference is that Simon has lowered the minimum age to compete to 12, and the kids in these auditions are better than alright.

text: #6 The Expanded Age Limit Factor Much has been made of the differences between **The** **X** **Factor** and its singing show rivals like American Idol and The Voice , but the most noticeable and immediately rewarding difference is that Simon has lowered the minimum age to compete to 12, and the kids in these auditions are **better** **than** alright.

_source.text: after 60 years of pop culture is anyone seriously saying that this has any merit - this is just dreadful - everything that is wrong with the X Factor generation - no originality - a really ordinary tune - the same boring structure - the same brain dead beat - 'so what' singing - just vacuous nothingness - we have to be able to do better than this - and it's at number 1 !!! Embarrassing
